The SHACL shape :zusaetzlichePartneridentifikation applies to all instances of the class org:FormalOrganization, requiring a single value (maximum count of 1) for the property edifact-o:additionalPartnerIdentificationEANCode, which must be a string with a maximum length of 35 characters; validation will fail with the message "The RFF+API segment is incorrect, i.e. the specification of the additional partner identification" if this property constraint is not met.

The SHACL shape :Zahlungsbedingung targets all instances of the class edifact-o:InvoiceDetails, enforcing a constraint on the property edifact-o:paymentCondition, which must have a maximum of 5 string values, each limited to the allowed values "As usual", "Extended", "Wie ueblich", or "Verlaengert", with a validation error message "The specified payment term is not one of the expected values, i.e. data element 4279 in the PAT segment is not equal to 1 or 7" if the constraint is violated.

The SHACL shape :ValutaDatum targets all instances of the class edifact-o:InvoiceDetails, requiring the property edifact-o:valutaDate to have a single string value (xsd:string) with a maximum length of 8 characters, and producing the error message "The specified value date is too long, i.e. the DTM+209" if this constraint is violated.

The SHACL shape :Abschlag applies to all instances of the class edifact-o:item, enforcing a constraint on the property edifact-o:hasAllowanceReason, which must have a string value (xsd:string) with a minimum length of 1 character and a maximum of 15 occurrences, with a validation error message "The data element 7160 or 7161 is missing in the ALC segment, i.e. the tee type specification."

The SHACL shape :Rabatt applies to all instances of the class edifact-o:item, enforcing a constraint on the property edifact-o:hasDiscountReason, which must be a string (xsd:string) with a minimum length of 1 character, allowing up to 15 occurrences, and producing the validation message "The data element 7160 or 7161 is missing in the ALC segment, i.e. the tee type specification" if this constraint is violated.

The SHACL shape :Zuschlag applies to all instances of the class edifact-o:item, enforcing a constraint on the property edifact-o:hasChargeReason, which must have a string value (xsd:string) with a minimum length of 1 character and a maximum of 15 occurrences; if this property is missing, appears more than 15 times, or its value is an empty string, validation will fail with the message "The data element 7160 or 7161 is missing in the ALC segment, i.e. the specification surcharge type."

The SHACL shape :AbschlagProzentsatz applies to all instances of the class edifact-o:item, specifying a property constraint on edifact-o:hasAllowancePercentage that requires a minimum of 1 and a maximum of 15 values, each being a float (xsd:float) with a minimum length of 1 character and a maximum length of 5 characters; if this property is missing or its value does not meet these conditions, validation will fail with the message: "The data element 5245 or 5482 is missing in the PCD segment, i.e. the percentage type and amount of the discount."

The SHACL shape :RabattProzentsatz targets all instances of the class edifact-o:item, enforcing a constraint on the property edifact-o:hasDiscountPercentage, which must have a value that is a float (xsd:float) with a minimum length of 1 and a maximum length of 5 characters, appear at most 15 times, and failing to meet this constraint will produce the validation message: "The data element 5245 or 5482 is missing in the PCD segment, i.e. the percentage type and amount of the discount."

The SHACL shape :ZuschlagProzentsatz applies to all instances of the class edifact-o:item, requiring the property edifact-o:hasChargePercentage to have a value that is a float (xsd:float) between 1 and 5 characters in length, appearing at most 15 times, and providing the error message "The data element 5245 or 5482 is missing in the PCD segment, i.e. the percentage type and amount of the surcharge" if the constraint is violated.

The SHACL shape :BruttoendbetragRechnunng applies to all instances of the class edifact-o:item, requiring either the property p2p-o-inv:hasAllowanceAmount or edifact-o:hasDiscountAmount to be present with a maximum of 2 values, each having a maximum length of 13 characters; if not, validation will fail with the message "The segment MOA+8, MOA+23 or MOA+204 is incorrect, i.e. the indication of the gross final amount of the invoice."

The SHACL shape :SteuerangabenItem applies to all instances of the class edifact-o:item, enforcing a constraint on the property edifact-o:hasVATrate, which must appear at most 5 times (maxCount set to 5), with each value being a string (xsd:string) no longer than 5 characters (maxLength set to 5), and producing the validation message "The TAX segment at item level is incorrect, i.e. the specification of the tax rate; TAX; SG 21; header part; is incorrect" if this constraint is violated.

The SHACL shape :Produktidentifikation targets all instances of the class edifact-o:item, enforcing a single string-valued property p2p-o-item:itemName that must appear exactly once, with a validation error message "The data element 7008 in the IMD segment is incorrect, i.e. the specification of the article name" if this constraint is not met.

The SHACL shape :Steuerbetrag targets all instances of the class edifact-o:item, specifying that each item must have exactly one edifact-o:hasTaxAmount property with a maximum length of 13 characters, and validation will fail with the message "The segment MOA+124 is incorrect, i.e. the tax amount is not specified" if this constraint is not met.

The SHACL shape :ZuAbschlagbetrag applies to all instances of the class edifact-o:item, requiring that either the property p2p-o-inv:hasAllowanceAmount or edifact-o:hasDiscountAmount is present at most twice, with a maximum length of 18 characters, and if neither condition is met, the validation will fail with the message "The segment MOA+23 or MOA+204 is incorrect, i.e. the specification of the surcharge or discount amount is incorrect."

The SHACL shape :BasisZuAbschlagbetrag targets all instances of the class edifact-o:item, enforcing a constraint on the property edifact-o:hasAdditionDeductionBasis, which must be a string with a maximum length of 13 characters, appearing exactly once (maxCount 1), and violating this rule will produce the message: "The MOA+25 segment is incorrect, i.e. the base amount of the surcharge or discount is incorrect."

The SHACL shape :SteuerangabenItem targets all instances of the class edifact-o:InvoiceDetails, enforcing a constraint on the property edifact-o:hasVATrate, which must have a maximum of 5 values (maxCount 5), with each value being a string of up to 5 characters (maxLength 5), and violating this constraint will produce the message: "The TAX segment at totals level is incorrect, i.e. the specification of the tax rate."

The SHACL shape :Steuerbetrag targets all instances of the class edifact-o:InvoiceDetails, enforcing a constraint on the property edifact-o:hasTaxAmount, which must appear exactly once (maxCount 1) and be a string with a maximum length of 13 characters, with a validation error message "The segment MOA+124 is incorrect, i.e. the tax amount is not specified." if the constraint is violated.

The SHACL shape :Prozesszugehoerigkeit targets all instances of the class edifact-o:E-Invoice, requiring them to have exactly one value for the property edifact-o:belongsToProcess, which must be "ProcessExample", and will fail validation if this property is missing, appears more than once, or has a different value.

The SHACL shape :StudentProfileShape applies to all instances of the class edu:StudentProfile, requiring them to have a string property edu:studentNumber with a minimum length of 6 characters and a single property edu:registrationDate with a date value, failing validation with the message "Student profile must include a student number and a registration date" if either property is missing or invalid.

The SHACL shape :CourseCatalogShape applies to all instances of the class edu:CourseCatalog, requiring each instance to have exactly one string value for edu:courseTitle with a minimum length of 5 characters, and exactly one integer value for edu:creditValue between 1 (inclusive) and 20 (inclusive); if these constraints are not met, validation will fail with the message "Each course must have a valid title and credit value between 1 and 20."

The SHACL shape :FacultyMemberShape applies to all instances of the class edu:FacultyMember, requiring that they have exactly one each of the properties edu:employeeID and edu:fullName, with edu:employeeID being a string with a minimum length of 5 characters and edu:fullName being a string with a minimum length of 3 characters; if these constraints are not met, validation will fail with the message: "Faculty member must have an employee ID and full name."

The SHACL shape :ResearchProjectShape applies to all instances of the class edu:ResearchProject, requiring them to have a string value for the property edu:projectID and a floating-point number value for the property edu:fundingAmount with a minimum inclusive value of 0.0; both properties must have at least one value, and failure to meet these constraints will result in the validation error "Research projects must have a project ID and funding amount."

The SHACL shape :ThesisSubmissionShape applies to all instances of the class edu:ThesisSubmission, requiring them to have exactly one edu:submissionDate with a value of type xsd:date, and at least one edu:evaluator with a value that is an instance of edu:Professor; if these conditions are not met, validation will fail with the message "Thesis submissions must include submission date and at least one evaluator."

The SHACL shape :LibraryMemberShape applies to all instances of the class edu:LibraryMember, requiring them to have a edu:membershipID property with a string value of at least 4 characters and an edu:expiryDate property with exactly one date value. If these constraints are not met, validation will fail with the message: "Library membership must include a valid ID and expiry date."

The SHACL shape :ClassScheduleShape targets all instances of the class edu:ClassSchedule and specifies a constraint that requires the presence of exactly one value for each of the properties edu:timeSlot and edu:location, each with a value that is a string (xsd:string) and has a minimum length of 3 characters; if either property is missing or does not meet the length requirement, validation will fail with the message "Class schedule must include time slot and location."

The SHACL shape :GradingPolicyShape targets all instances of the class edu:GradingPolicy, requiring each instance to have exactly one edu:gradeScale property with a value of either "A", "B", "C", "D", or "F", and exactly one edu:passThreshold property with a float value between 0.0 and 100.0 (inclusive); if these conditions are not met, validation will fail with the message "Grading policy must include a valid scale and threshold score."

The SHACL shape :InternshipShape applies to all instances of the class edu:Internship and enforces two constraints: the property edu:companyName must have a string value with a minimum length of 2 characters, and the property edu:startDate must have at least one date value. If either of these properties is missing or does not meet these conditions, validation will fail with the message: "Internship must include company name and start date."

The SHACL shape :EnrollmentStatusShape targets all instances of the class edu:EnrollmentStatus, and specifies two simultaneous property constraints: the property edu:isActive must have a single Boolean value, and the property edu:semesterName must have a single string value with a minimum length of 3 characters; if these conditions are not met, validation will fail with the message: "Enrollment status must indicate if active and specify the semester."

The SHACL shape :DigitalBadgeShape targets all instances of the class edu:DigitalBadge, requiring each instance to have exactly one value for edu:badgeTitle, which must be a string with a minimum length of 4 characters, and exactly one value for edu:issuedOn, which must be a date. If these conditions are not met, validation will fail with the message: "Each digital badge must have a title and issue date."

The SHACL shape :AlumniRecordShape applies to all instances of the class edu:AlumniRecord, requiring the simultaneous presence of two properties: edu:graduationYear with a value of type xsd:gYear, and edu:degreeAwarded with a string value (xsd:string) of at least 3 characters in length. If either property is missing or invalid, validation will fail with the error message "Alumni record must contain graduation year and awarded degree."

The SHACL shape :LearningOutcomeShape applies to all instances of the class edu:LearningOutcome, specifying that each instance must have a property edu:outcomeText with a string value of at least 10 characters in length, and a property edu:linkedCourse that references at least one instance of the class edu:Course; if these constraints are not met, validation will fail with the message "Learning outcome must describe the result and be linked to a course."

The SHACL shape :AcademicAlertShape targets all instances of the class edu:AcademicAlert, requiring exactly one value for each of the two properties: edu:alertType, which must be one of the strings "Low GPA", "Attendance", or "Plagiarism", and edu:triggeredOn, which must be a date (xsd:date); if either property is missing or invalid, validation will fail with the message "Academic alert must include type and trigger date."

The SHACL shape :StudyAbroadShape applies to all instances of the class edu:StudyAbroad, requiring each instance to have exactly one string value for the properties edu:hostUniversity and edu:exchangePeriod; if either property is missing or has a non-string value, validation will fail with the message "Study abroad info must include host university and exchange period."

The SHACL shape :AttendanceLogShape applies to all instances of the class edu:AttendanceLog, requiring them to have exactly one value for the property edu:presentStatus, which must be one of the strings "Present", "Absent", or "Excused", and exactly one value for the property edu:dateRecorded, which must be a date (xsd:date), with a validation failure message of "Attendance log must include present status and date" if these constraints are not met.

The SHACL shape :CapstoneProjectShape applies to all instances of the class edu:CapstoneProject, requiring exactly one value for each of two properties: edu:projectTitle, which must be a string with a minimum length of 5 characters, and edu:finalScore, which must be a float between 0.0 and 100.0; if these constraints are not met, validation will fail with the message "Capstone project must have a title and a score between 0 and 100."

The SHACL shape :CertificationRecordShape applies to all instances of the class edu:CertificationRecord, mandating the presence of two properties: edu:certificateName with a string value of at least 3 characters, and edu:validUntil with a date value, with validation failure yielding the message "Certification record must include a name and a valid until date."

The SHACL shape :DisciplinaryActionShape applies to all instances of the class edu:DisciplinaryAction, requiring each instance to have exactly one edu:violationType property with a value of either "Cheating", "Harassment", or "Forgery", and exactly one edu:resolved property with a boolean value; if these conditions are not met, validation will fail with the message: "Disciplinary actions must specify type and resolution status."

The SHACL shape :ExchangeProgramShape targets all instances of the class edu:ExchangeProgram, requiring each instance to have exactly one edu:partnerInstitution property and one edu:languageOfInstruction property, both with string values (xsd:string), and validation will fail with the message "Exchange programs must specify partner institution and instruction language" if either property is missing or has a non-string value.

The SHACL shape :MentorshipProgramShape applies to all instances of the class edu:MentorshipProgram, mandating that each instance must have at least one edu:mentor property with a value that is an instance of the class edu:FacultyMember, and a single edu:menteeCount property with a value that is an integer greater than or equal to 1; if these conditions are not met, validation will fail with the message: "Mentorship program must have at least one faculty mentor and a mentee count."

The SHACL shape :LanguageTestShape applies to all instances of the class edu:LanguageTest, mandating that each instance has exactly one string value for the property edu:testName and exactly one float value for the property edu:resultScore, which must be between 0.0 (inclusive) and 100.0 (inclusive), otherwise validation will fail with the message: "Language test must have a name and a score between 0 and 100."

The SHACL shape :StudentLoanShape applies to all instances of the class edu:StudentLoan, requiring both a edu:loanAmount property with a float value of 0.0 or higher and a edu:repaymentTerm property with a string value; if either property is missing or invalid, validation will fail with the message "Student loan must include loan amount and repayment term."

The SHACL shape :TeachingAssignmentShape applies to all instances of the class edu:TeachingAssignment, requiring each instance to have at least one value for the property edu:assignedFaculty, which must be an instance of edu:FacultyMember, and at least one value for the property edu:teachingHours, which must be an integer with a minimum value of 1; if these conditions are not met, validation will fail with the message "Teaching assignment must include a faculty member and the number of hours."

The SHACL shape :HonorRollShape applies to all instances of the class edu:HonorRoll, mandating the presence of two properties: edu:studentName with a string value of at least 3 characters, and edu:GPA with a float value between 3.5 and 4.0 (inclusive), and validation will fail if either condition is not met, with the error message "Honor roll entry must include student name and GPA ≥ 3.5."

The SHACL shape :EventParticipationShape applies to all instances of the class edu:EventParticipation, requiring them to have a value for edu:eventType that is one of "Conference", "Workshop", or "Competition", and a value for edu:participantID that is a string with a minimum length of 4 characters; if either condition is not met, validation will fail with the message "Event participation must include the event type and participant ID."

The SHACL shape :FinalExamShape targets all instances of the class edu:FinalExam and enforces a constraint with two conditions: the property edu:examCode must be present with a single value that is a string (xsd:string) having a minimum length of 5 characters, and the property edu:durationMinutes must be present with a single value that is an integer (xsd:integer) having a minimum value of 30; if either condition is not met, validation will fail with the message: "Final exam must include an exam code and a duration in minutes."

The SHACL shape :OnlineCourseShape targets all instances of the class edu:OnlineCourse, requiring each to have exactly one value for edu:platform as a string and exactly one value for edu:url as a URI; if either property is missing or has an invalid data type, the validation will fail with the message "Online course must specify platform and course URL."

The SHACL shape :ExtracurricularShape applies to all instances of the class edu:Extracurricular, mandating the presence of two properties: edu:activityName with a string value, and edu:weeklyHours with an integer value of at least 1, with a validation failure message of "Extracurricular record must include activity name and hours per week" if either property is missing or invalid.

The SHACL shape :ScholarshipApplicationShape applies to all instances of the class edu:ScholarshipApplication, requiring each instance to have either a GPA (edu:GPA) with a value of 3.0 or higher (xsd:float) or a submitted essay (edu:essaySubmitted) with a value of true (xsd:boolean), with a failure message "Applicant must either have a GPA ≥ 3.0 or have submitted an essay" if neither condition is met.

The SHACL shape :ServerSpecShape targets all instances of the class it:ServerSpec, requiring each instance to have exactly two properties: it:cpuCores with a minimum value of 2 and it:ramGB with a minimum value of 4, both with integer values (xsd:integer), and validation will fail with the message "Each server must specify at least 2 CPU cores and 4GB RAM" if these conditions are not met.

The SHACL shape :OperatingSystemShape applies to all instances of the class it:OperatingSystem, requiring exactly two properties: it:osName with a string value (xsd:string) of at least 3 characters, or validation will fail with the message "Operating system name must be a valid string", and it:version with a string value (xsd:string), with validation failing if it's missing or invalid, accompanied by the message "Each OS must include a version string".

The SHACL shape :ProtocolSupportShape targets all instances of the class it:ProtocolSupport and specifies two property constraints: the property it:protocolType must have a value of either "HTTP", "HTTPS", "FTP", "SSH", or "SFTP", with a validation failure message "Protocol must be one of the supported types.", and the property it:isEncrypted must have a boolean value (xsd:boolean), with a validation failure message "You must specify whether the protocol is encrypted."

The SHACL shape :FirewallRuleShape applies to all instances of the class it:FirewallRule, requiring the presence of two properties: it:portNumber, which must be an integer between 1 and 65535 (inclusive), and it:ruleAction, which must be either "Allow" or "Deny". If these conditions are not met, validation will fail with the message "Firewall rule must define a valid port and an allow/deny action."

The SHACL shape :AccessCredentialShape applies to all instances of the class it:AccessCredential, mandating the presence of two properties: it:username with a string value (xsd:string) of at least 3 characters, and it:passwordHash with a string value (xsd:string), with a validation failure message stating "Each access credential must include a username and password hash" if either property is missing or invalid.

The SHACL shape :SystemLogPolicyShape applies to all instances of the class it:SystemLogPolicy, requiring that each instance has exactly one value for the property it:logRetentionDays, which must be an integer with a minimum value of 7, and exactly one value for the property it:isRotationEnabled, which must be a boolean; if these constraints are not met, validation will fail with the message "Log policies must specify retention days and whether rotation is enabled."

The SHACL shape :BackupScheduleShape targets all instances of the class it:BackupSchedule, specifying two mandatory property constraints: one on it:frequency, requiring a string value to be one of "Daily", "Weekly", or "Monthly", and another on it:isEncrypted, requiring a boolean value, with respective validation error messages if these constraints are violated.

The SHACL shape :SSHConfigShape applies to all instances of the class it:SSHConfig, ensuring that each instance has exactly one value for it:port, which must be the integer 22, and exactly one value for it:keyBasedAuth, which must be true, with validation failure messages "SSH must use port 22 unless configured otherwise" and "SSH configuration must enforce key-based authentication", respectively, if these constraints are not met.

The SHACL shape :DiskQuotaShape targets all instances of the class it:DiskQuota, enforcing two simultaneous constraints: the property it:allocatedGB must be an integer with a minimum value of 1, and the property it:mountPoint must be a string with a minimum length of 2 characters; failure to meet these conditions will result in validation failure with the message "Disk quota must define allocated space and a valid mount point."

The SHACL shape :AdminRoleShape applies to all instances of the class it:AdminRole, requiring that either the property it:privilegeLevel has a value of at least 5 (inclusive) as an integer, or the property it:hasFullAccess has a value of true as a boolean; if neither condition is met, validation will fail with the message "Admin role must either have privilege level ≥ 5 or full access enabled."

The SHACL shape :UserAccountShape targets all instances of the class it:UserAccount, mandating the presence of two properties: it:username with a string value at least 4 characters long, and it:isActive with a boolean value. If either property is missing or does not meet these conditions, validation will fail with the message "User accounts must specify a username and indicate whether the account is active."

The SHACL shape :TLSCertificateShape applies to all instances of the class it:TLSCertificate, mandating that each instance must have exactly one it:issuer property with a string value of at least 3 characters and exactly one it:validUntil property with a date value; failure to comply will trigger the validation error message "TLS certificates must specify an issuer and an expiration date."

The SHACL shape :PortBindingShape applies to all instances of the class it:PortBinding, requiring each instance to have exactly one value for the property it:boundPort, which must be an integer between 1 and 65535 (inclusive), and exactly one value for the property it:protocol, which must be either "TCP" or "UDP", with a validation error message "Port bindings must define a valid port number and either TCP or UDP protocol" if these constraints are not met.

The SHACL shape :DatabaseConnectionShape targets all instances of the class it:DatabaseConnection, requiring each instance to have exactly one it:connectionURL property with a value of type xsd:anyURI and exactly one it:timeoutSeconds property with a value of type xsd:integer that is greater than or equal to 1; if these constraints are not met, validation will fail with the message "Database connection must include a URL and a timeout value in seconds."

The SHACL shape :AccessTokenShape applies to all instances of the class it:AccessToken, enforcing the presence of two mandatory properties: it:tokenValue, a string of at least 10 characters, and it:expiresAt, a date and time, with a validation failure message "Access token must include a token value and an expiration timestamp" if either property is missing or invalid.

The SHACL shape :LoadBalancerConfigShape applies to all instances of the class it:LoadBalancerConfig, requiring them to have exactly one value for the property it:algorithm, which must be one of "RoundRobin", "LeastConnections", or "IPHash", and exactly one boolean value for the property it:healthCheckEnabled, with a validation failure message "Load balancer config must specify an algorithm and whether health checks are enabled." if these constraints are not met.

The SHACL shape :EnvironmentVariableShape applies to all instances of the class it:EnvironmentVariable, requiring each instance to have exactly two properties: it:variableName with a string value of at least 2 characters in length, and it:value with a string value, otherwise validation will fail with the message "Environment variables must include a name and a value."

The SHACL shape :StorageMountShape applies to all instances of the class it:StorageMount, mandating the presence of two properties: it:mountPath with a string value of at least one character, and it:filesystemType with a value of either "ext4", "xfs", or "ntfs". If these constraints are not met, validation will fail with the message "Storage mount must define a path and a supported filesystem type."

The SHACL shape :ScheduledJobShape applies to all instances of the class it:ScheduledJob, requiring them to have both a string value for it:jobName with a minimum length of 3 characters and a string value for it:cronExpression with a minimum length of 9 characters; if either property is missing or does not meet the specified length requirements, validation will fail with the message "Scheduled jobs must have a name and a valid cron expression."

The SHACL shape :ContainerDeploymentShape applies to all instances of the class it:ContainerDeployment, requiring each instance to have exactly one string value for the property it:imageName and exactly one integer value for the property it:replicaCount with a minimum value of 1, and failure to meet these constraints will result in a validation error with the message "Container deployments must specify an image name and at least one replica."

The SHACL shape :DNSConfigShape applies to all instances of the class it:DNSConfig, mandating that each instance has a string-valued property it:primaryDNS with a valid IPv4 address (matching the pattern "^\\d{1,3}(\\.\\d{1,3}){3}$") and optionally a string-valued property it:secondaryDNS; validation will fail with the message "DNS configuration must include a valid primary IP address and optionally a secondary one" if either the primary DNS address is invalid or missing, or if the secondary DNS address is present but invalid.

The SHACL shape :ApiRateLimitShape targets all instances of the class it:ApiRateLimit, requiring each to have exactly one it:limitPerMinute and one it:burstLimit property, both with integer values (xsd:integer) of at least 1, otherwise validation will fail with the message "API rate limits must specify per-minute and burst limits."

The SHACL shape :ProxyServerShape applies to all instances of the class it:ProxyServer, mandating the presence of exactly one it:proxyAddress property with a string value and one it:requiresAuthentication property with a boolean value; if either property is missing or has an invalid value, validation will fail with the message: "Proxy servers must define an address and whether authentication is required."

The SHACL shape :MonitoringAgentShape applies to all instances of the class it:MonitoringAgent, requiring exactly one string value for the property it:agentID and exactly one boolean value for the property it:isActive, with a validation failure message "Monitoring agent must have an ID and indicate if it is active." if these constraints are not met.

The SHACL shape :AlertRuleShape targets all instances of the class it:AlertRule and specifies a validation rule with an sh:or condition that requires exactly one of two properties to be present: either it:thresholdValue with a value that is a floating-point number (xsd:float) greater than or equal to 0.0, or it:expression with a value that is a string (xsd:string) with a minimum length of 5 characters, otherwise the validation will fail with the message "Alert rules must define either a numeric threshold or a condition expression."

The SHACL shape :NetworkInterfaceShape targets all instances of the class it:NetworkInterface, requiring each instance to have two specific properties: it:interfaceName with a string value of at least 2 characters, and it:macAddress with a string value conforming to the pattern "^([0-9A-Fa-f]{2}:){5}[0-9A-Fa-f]{2}$". Failure to meet these constraints will result in a validation error with the message "Network interface must have a name and a valid MAC address."

The SHACL shape :AccessPolicyShape applies to all instances of the class it:AccessPolicy, requiring exactly one occurrence of each of the following properties: it:role with a value that must be one of the strings "Admin", "Editor", or "Viewer", and it:resource with a value that must be a string (xsd:string), and if these conditions are not met, validation will fail with the message "Access policies must define a role and the associated resource."

The SHACL shape :ErrorLogShape applies to all instances of the class it:ErrorLog, mandating the presence of two properties: it:errorCode, which must be a string with a minimum length of 3 characters, and it:timestamp, which must be a dateTime. If either property is missing or does not conform to these constraints, validation will fail with the message: "Error logs must include an error code and timestamp."

The SHACL shape :WebServerConfigShape applies to all instances of the class it:WebServerConfig, requiring two mandatory properties: it:documentRoot with a minimum length of 1 character and a string value, and it:sslEnabled with a boolean value, with a validation failure message of "Web server config must specify document root and whether SSL is enabled."

The SHACL shape :TokenRevocationShape applies to all instances of the class it:TokenRevocation and enforces a constraint that requires two properties to be present: it:tokenID with a string value (xsd:string) of at least 8 characters, and it:revokedAt with a dateTime value (xsd:dateTime).

The SHACL shape :PriceShape targets all instances of the class catalog:PriceDetail, enforcing two property constraints: one on catalog:priceValue, requiring its value to be a non-negative floating-point number (xsd:float) with a minimum inclusive value of 0.0, and another on catalog:currency, requiring its value to be one of the allowed currency codes: "USD", "EUR", "INR", or "GBP", with each property appearing exactly once (implicitly implied by the absence of cardinality constraints). If these constraints are not met, validation will fail with the message: "Price must be non-negative and include a valid currency code."

The SHACL shape :EditorShape applies to all instances of the class pub:Editor, mandating the presence of exactly one string value for the property pub:editorName, and will return a validation error with the message "Editor name is required" if this constraint is not met.

The SHACL shape :AbstractShape applies to all instances of the class pub:Abstract, mandating a single string value for the property pub:abstractText, with a validation failure message of "Abstract text is required."

The SHACL shape :AffiliationShape targets all instances of the class pub:Affiliation, requiring each to have exactly one value for the property pub:institution, which must be a string (xsd:string), and returns the message "Affiliation institution must be listed" if this constraint is violated.

The SHACL shape :CountryShape applies to all instances of the class pub:Country, requiring exactly one string value (xsd:string) for the property pub:countryCode, and validation will fail with the message "Country code must be present" if this property is missing.

The SHACL shape :KeywordShape targets all instances of the class pub:Keyword and requires each instance to have exactly one string value for the property pub:term, with a validation error message "Keyword term is required." if this property is missing or its value is not a string.

The SHACL shape :TokenValidityShape targets all instances of the class it:AccessPolicy, requiring exactly one value of type integer (xsd:integer) for the property it:tokenValidityHours within the range of 1 to 72 (inclusive), with a validation error message "Token validity period must be between 1 and 72 hours." if the constraint is not met.

The SHACL shape :RoleAssignmentShape targets all instances of the class it:User, mandating that each user has at least one it:Role instance assigned through the property it:assignedRoles, with a validation failure message "User must be assigned at least one role" if this constraint is not met.

The SHACL shape :PolicyValidityRangeShape targets all instances of the class it:AccessPolicy, requiring each instance to have exactly one it:validFrom property and one it:expiresOn property, both with values of type xsd:date, and will output the message "Policy must include both start and expiration dates" if this condition is not met.

The SHACL shape :PolicyNotExpiredShape applies to all instances of the class it:AccessPolicy, specifying that the property it:expiresOn must have exactly one value, which is a date that is not before 2024-01-01 (exclusive), and if not, validation will fail with the message: "Policy must not be expired before 2024."

The SHACL shape :RestrictedRoleNamePatternShape applies to all instances of the class it:Role, requiring the value of the rdfs:label property to be a single string (xsd:string) exactly matching one of "Admin", "Root", or "Superuser", with a validation failure message "Role name must be one of: Admin, Root, or Superuser."

The SHACL shape :ExclusiveAdminAccessShape applies to all instances of the class it:AccessPolicy, requiring that they must not have the property it:hasPublicAccess with a value of true, i.e., administrative policies must not allow public access, and validation will fail with the message "Administrative policies must not allow public access" if this constraint is violated.

The SHACL shape :DeviceTypeShape applies to all instances of the class it:SmartDevice, requiring the property it:deviceType to have exactly one value, which must be one of the strings "Thermostat", "Light", "MotionSensor", or "Camera", and will return a validation error with the message "Device type must be one of: Thermostat, Light, MotionSensor, or Camera" if this constraint is not met.

The SHACL shape :DeviceLocationShape targets all instances of the class it:SmartDevice and enforces a mandatory property constraint on it:location, requiring a non-empty string value with a minimum length of 2 characters, otherwise validation will fail with the message: "Device location must be a non-empty string."

The SHACL shape :RuleEnabledShape applies to all instances of the class it:ControlRule, requiring exactly one boolean value (xsd:boolean) for the property it:isEnabled, indicating whether the control rule is enabled, and will trigger a validation error with the message "Each control rule must specify whether it is enabled" if this property is missing or has an invalid value.

The SHACL shape :TriggerSensorShape applies to all instances of the class it:Trigger, requiring each trigger to have exactly one it:triggeredBy property that must be linked to a single instance of the class it:Sensor, with a validation error message "Each trigger must be linked to a sensor." if this constraint is not met.

The SHACL shape :TemperatureRangeShape applies to all instances of the class it:Sensor, and specifies a mandatory property constraint on it:temperatureValue that requires its value to be a float (xsd:float) within the range of -30 to 60 degrees Celsius (inclusive), with no cardinality restriction implied; if the value is outside this range, validation will fail with the message: "Temperature must be between -30 and 60 degrees Celsius."

The SHACL shape :ClientBlacklistStatusShape applies to all instances of the class foaf:Person, requiring them to have exactly one :isBlacklisted property with a boolean value (xsd:boolean), and will trigger a validation error with the message "Blacklist status must be either true or false" if this constraint is not met.

The SHACL shape :ClientMarketingConsentShape targets all instances of the class foaf:Person and enforces a constraint on the property :marketingConsent, requiring it to have exactly one value that is a boolean (xsd:boolean), with a validation failure message of "Marketing consent must be clearly stated."

The SHACL shape :ClientRegionOrCountryShape applies to all instances of the class foaf:Person, requiring exactly one of either vcard:region or vcard:country-name properties to be present with a string value, and validation will fail with the message "Client must provide either a region or a country" if neither is provided.

The SHACL shape :ClientIdentifierShape targets all instances of the class foaf:Person, requiring each individual to have exactly one cmns-id:identifies property with a value that is an instance of cmns-id:Identifier, and will return a validation error with the message "Each client must have a unique identifier assigned." if this constraint is not met.

The SHACL shape :ClientValidLocationFormat targets all instances of the class foaf:Person, requiring the property :locationCoordinates to be a single string value (xsd:string) that matches the pattern "^-?\\d+(\\.\\d+)?,-?\\d+(\\.\\d+)?", which represents the format 'latitude,longitude', and produces the validation message "Location coordinates must follow the format 'latitude,longitude'" if this constraint is violated.

The SHACL shape :ClientMustNotBeAnonymous applies to all instances of the class foaf:Person, specifying that the property foaf:name must not have the value "Anonymous", with a minimum cardinality of zero (i.e., the property may be absent), and in case of violation, the validation will fail with the message "Client name cannot be 'Anonymous'".

The SHACL shape :ClientAccountStatusLogic validates all instances of the class foaf:Person, enforcing that if an individual has an account tier of "Premium", then their account status must be "Active"; otherwise, validation fails with the message "Premium clients must have Active account status."

The SHACL shape :ClientConditionalMarketingOptIn applies to all instances of the class foaf:Person, specifying that either the property :marketingConsent must have exactly one value of true, or the property :accountTier must have exactly one value of "Basic", and if neither condition is met, validation will fail with the message: "Only Basic tier clients can skip marketing consent."

The SHACL shape :SeatNumberShape applies to all instances of the class schema1:Ticket, specifying that the property schema1:seatNumber must have exactly one value, which is a non-empty string with a minimum length of 1 character and a maximum length of 10 characters, and failure to comply will result in a validation error with the message "Seat number must be a non-empty string with up to 10 characters."

The SHACL shape :TicketTokenShape applies to all instances of the class schema1:Ticket, specifying that each instance must have exactly one schema1:ticketToken property with a value that is an alphanumeric string (xsd:string) matching the pattern "^[A-Z0-9]{10,}$", which means it must contain at least 10 characters and only consist of uppercase letters and digits, and if this property does not conform to this pattern, validation will fail with the message: "Ticket token must be an alphanumeric string of at least 10 characters."

The SHACL shape :TicketHolderShape applies to all instances of the class schema1:Ticket, requiring each ticket to have exactly one value for schema1:underName that must be of type foaf:Person, representing a person, and will fail validation with the message "Each ticket must be assigned to a person" if this constraint is not met.

The SHACL shape :RefundEligibilityShape targets all instances of the class schema1:Ticket, requiring exactly one value for the property schema1:refundable, which must be a boolean (xsd:boolean), and will return the validation error message "Indicate whether the ticket is refundable" if this constraint is not met.

The SHACL shape :TicketCategoryShape applies to all instances of the class schema1:Ticket, mandating that the schema1:category property has exactly one value, which must be one of the predefined allowed values: "VIP", "Regular", "Student", or "Backstage", and if this constraint is not met, validation will fail with the message: "Ticket category must be one of: VIP, Regular, Student, or Backstage."

The SHACL shape :TicketIssueDateShape targets all instances of the class schema1:Ticket and specifies that each instance must have exactly one schema1:issuedThrough property with a value that is an instance of schema1:Organization, with a validation error message "The issuing organization of the ticket must be specified."

The SHACL shape :TicketScanTimeShape applies to all instances of the class schema1:Ticket and requires that each ticket has exactly one schema1:dateUsed property with a valid date and time value (xsd:dateTime), otherwise validation will fail with the message "The timestamp when the ticket was used must be recorded."

The SHACL shape :TicketLanguageShape targets all instances of the class schema1:Ticket, requiring exactly one string value for the property schema1:inLanguage, and validation will fail with the message "Specify the language for the ticket." if this property is missing or has an invalid value.

The SHACL shape :TicketDiscountShape applies to all instances of the class schema1:Ticket, mandating a single float value (xsd:float) for the schema1:discount property, which must be within the inclusive range of 0.0 to 100.0; any violations will result in a validation error with the message "Ticket discount must be between 0% and 100%."

The SHACL shape :TicketCurrencyShape applies to all instances of the class schema1:Ticket, enforcing a constraint on the required property schema1:priceCurrency, which must have exactly one value that matches the pattern of a valid 3-letter ISO currency code (represented by the regular expression "^[A-Z]{3}$"), with a validation error message "Currency code must be a valid 3-letter ISO currency code" if the constraint is violated.

The SHACL shape :GroupTicketLimitShape targets all instances of the class schema1:Ticket, requiring each ticket to have exactly one schema1:isPartOf property with a value of type schema1:Event, and exactly one schema1:totalTicketLimit property with an integer value not exceeding 100; validation fails with the message "Group tickets must belong to an event and have a total limit of 100 or fewer" if these conditions are not met.

The SHACL shape :VIPTicketQualificationShape applies to all instances of the class schema1:Ticket, requiring at least one occurrence of "VIP" as the value of schema1:category, and simultaneously, a minimum value of €100.00 for schema1:price; if these conditions are not met, validation will fail with the message "VIP tickets must be priced at least €100."

The SHACL shape :MultipleSeatReservationShape targets all instances of the class schema1:Ticket, specifying that each ticket must have between 1 and 5 schema1:seatNumber values, failing validation with the message "A ticket may reserve between 1 and 5 seats" if this constraint is not met.

The SHACL shape :TicketLanguageMatchShape applies to all instances of the class schema1:Ticket, requiring the value of schema1:inLanguage to be exactly one of "en", "de", "fr", or "es", and will trigger a validation error with the message "Language must be one of: English, German, French, or Spanish." if this constraint is not met.

The SHACL shape :UserRoleShape applies to all instances of the class it:User, specifying that the value of property it:hasRole must be exactly one of "Admin", "Editor", "Viewer", or "Auditor", with a validation failure message "User role must be one of: Admin, Editor, Viewer, or Auditor."

The SHACL shape :ResourcePathShape applies to all instances of the class it:AccessPolicy, specifying that each instance must have exactly one string value for the property it:resourcePath, which must match the pattern "^/api/.*", i.e., it must begin with '/api/'; if the value does not conform to this pattern, validation will fail with the message: "Resource path must begin with '/api/'".

The SHACL shape :PolicyExpiryDateShape targets all instances of the class it:AccessPolicy, mandating that each must have exactly one property it:expiresOn with a value of type xsd:date, and will trigger a validation error with the message "Access policy must define an expiration date" if this constraint is not met.

The SHACL shape :GroupMembershipShape applies to all instances of the class it:User, requiring each user to have at least one value (minimum count of 1) for the property it:memberOfGroup, which must be an instance of the class org:Organization, and failure to meet this constraint will result in a validation error with the message "User must belong to at least one group or organization."

The SHACL shape :PolicyOwnerShape applies to all instances of the class it:AccessPolicy, requiring each policy to have exactly one creator, represented by a value of type foaf:Person, specified through the property it:createdBy, and validation will fail with the message "Each policy must have a defined creator" if this property is missing.

The SHACL shape :PolicyScopeShape targets all instances of the class it:AccessPolicy, requiring them to have exactly one value for the property it:policyScope, which must be one of "Global", "Departmental", or "Project-specific", and validation will fail with the message "Policy scope must be Global, Departmental, or Project-specific" if this constraint is not met.

The SHACL shape :TwoFactorRequirementShape applies to all instances of the class it:AccessPolicy, requiring exactly one boolean value for the property it:requiresTwoFactor, with a validation error message "Specify whether two-factor authentication is required." if this constraint is not met.

The SHACL shape :AccessFrequencyLimitShape applies to all instances of the class it:AccessPolicy, requiring the property it:maxRequestsPerDay to have exactly one value that is a positive integer (xsd:integer) with a minimum value of 1, with a validation failure message "Maximum number of requests per day must be a positive integer."

The SHACL shape :PolicyCommentShape applies to all instances of the class it:AccessPolicy, requiring them to have exactly one rdfs:comment property with a value that is a string (xsd:string) with a maximum length of 250 characters, and if this constraint is not met, validation will fail with the message: "Policy comment must not exceed 250 characters."

The SHACL shape :ResourceLabelShape targets all instances of the class it:AccessPolicy, specifying a mandatory property constraint on rdfs:label, requiring its value to be a string (xsd:string) with a minimum length of 5 characters and a maximum length of 100 characters, and producing the validation message "Resource label must be between 5 and 100 characters long." if this constraint is violated.

The SHACL shape :UserCredentialLogicShape applies to all instances of the class it:User, requiring each user to have either a secure password (specified by the property it:hasPassword with a string value of at least 8 characters) or biometric authentication (specified by the property it:hasBiometricAuth with a boolean value of true), failing validation with the message "User must have either a secure password or biometric authentication" if neither condition is met.

The SHACL shape :TwoFactorAndSecureRoleShape applies to all instances of the class it:AccessPolicy, specifying that each instance must have the property it:requiresTwoFactor set to true and the property it:accessLevel set to a value of at least 4; if these conditions are not met, validation will fail with the message "High-access policies must require two-factor authentication."

The SHACL shape :ResourceAccessXORShape applies to all instances of the class it:AccessPolicy, enforcing an exclusive constraint on the properties it:hasReadAccess and it:hasWriteAccess, requiring that exactly one of them has a value of true, with a validation error message "Policy can grant either read or write access, but not both" if the constraint is violated.

The SHACL shape :IPRangeAndAuthMethodShape applies to all instances of the class it:AccessPolicy, requiring that they have exactly one it:allowedIPRange value matching the pattern "^\\d{1,3}(\\.\\d{1,3}){3}/\\d{1,2}$" and exactly one it:authenticationMethod value that is either "Token" or "Biometric", with a validation failure message "Token or Biometric-based policies must specify a valid IP range."

The SHACL shape :TimeRestrictedPolicyShape targets all instances of the class it:AccessPolicy. It specifies a property constraint on it:accessWindow, which must have exactly two properties: it:startHour and it:endHour, both with integer values (xsd:integer) within the range of 0 to 23 (inclusive). If this constraint is violated, the validation will produce the message: "Access window must define start and end hour within 0–23 range."

The SHACL shape :DeviceIDShape targets all instances of the class it:SmartDevice, ensuring that each has exactly one value for the property it:deviceID, which must be a string (xsd:string) that matches the pattern "^DEV-[0-9A-Z]{6}$", i.e., "DEV-" followed by six uppercase letters or digits, with a validation failure message of "Device ID must follow the pattern DEV-XXXXXX with uppercase letters and digits."

The SHACL shape :ControlRuleNameShape targets all instances of the class it:ControlRule, requiring a single it:ruleName property with a string value (xsd:string) that has a minimum length of exactly 5 characters, and will produce the validation message "Control rule must have a descriptive name of at least 5 characters" if this constraint is violated.

The SHACL shape :ActivationTimeWindowShape applies to all instances of the class it:ControlRule, requiring exactly one value for the property it:activationWindow, which must be a string (xsd:string) conforming to the specific format "HH:MM-HH:MM" as defined by the pattern "^[0-2][0-9]:[0-5][0-9]-[0-2][0-9]:[0-5][0-9]$", and validation will fail with the message "Activation window must follow the format HH:MM-HH:MM" if this constraint is not met.

The SHACL shape :TriggerConditionShape targets all instances of the class it:Trigger, mandating that each instance has exactly one string value for the property it:condition, with a validation error message "A valid condition expression must be provided for each trigger." if this constraint is not met.

The SHACL shape :DeviceFirmwareVersionShape targets all instances of the class it:SmartDevice, specifying a single mandatory string property constraint on it:firmwareVersion, requiring its value to conform to the pattern "^v[0-9]+\\.[0-9]+\\.[0-9]+$", representing the format vX.Y.Z (e.g., v1.0.3), with a validation failure message "Firmware version must follow the format vX.Y.Z (e.g., v1.0.3)" if the pattern is not matched.

The SHACL shape :HumidityAlertThresholdShape applies to all instances of the class it:Sensor, specifying a single mandatory property constraint on it:humidityThreshold that requires a decimal value (xsd:decimal) within the inclusive range of 0.0 to 100.0, and if the value falls outside this range, validation will fail with the message: "Humidity threshold must be between 0 and 100 percent."

The SHACL shape :FirmwareUpdateStatusShape targets all instances of the class it:SmartDevice, requiring exactly one boolean value for the property it:firmwareUpdateAvailable, with a validation error message "Device must indicate if a firmware update is available." if this constraint is not met.

The SHACL shape :ScheduleEndShape applies to all instances of the class it:Schedule, requiring exactly one it:endTime property with a valid xsd:dateTime value; if this property is missing or its value is invalid, validation will fail with the message: "Schedule must specify a valid end time."

The SHACL shape :LinkedRoomShape targets all instances of the class it:SmartDevice, enforcing a constraint on the mandatory property it:assignedRoom, which must have exactly one value that is a valid IRI; if this property is missing or its value is not a valid IRI, validation will fail with the message: "Device must be assigned to a valid room IRI."

The SHACL shape :OverrideAllowedShape applies to all instances of the class it:ControlRule, requiring exactly one value for the property it:userOverrideAllowed, which must be a boolean (xsd:boolean), with a validation error message "Specify whether user override is allowed for this rule." if the constraint is not met.

The SHACL shape :CriticalDeviceShape applies to all instances of the class it:SmartDevice, requiring both the existence of property it:batteryLevel with an integer value not exceeding 20 and property it:isCriticalDevice with a value of true; if either condition is not met, validation will fail with the message "Critical devices must alert when battery level is below 20%."

The SHACL shape :ExclusiveControlModeShape applies to all instances of the class it:ControlRule, requiring exactly one value for the it:controlMode property, which must be either "Manual", "Scheduled", or "SensorBased"; validation will fail with the message "Control mode must be exclusively one of: Manual, Scheduled, or SensorBased" if this property is missing, appears more than once, or has any other value.

The SHACL shape :LinkedActionsConsistencyShape applies to all instances of the class it:Trigger, mandating that each trigger has exactly one it:executesAction property with a value of type it:ControlAction and exactly one it:linkedDevice property with a value of type it:SmartDevice, with a validation failure message of "Each trigger must link to both a device and an action" if these constraints are not met.

The SHACL shape :RedundantTriggersShape targets all instances of the class it:ControlRule, enforcing a constraint on the property it:hasTrigger, which must have a maximum of 2 values, with a validation failure message "No more than two triggers should be assigned to a control rule to avoid redundancy" if more than two triggers are assigned.

The SHACL shape :TemperatureSafetyConstraintShape applies to all instances of the class it:Sensor, specifying that either the property it:temperatureValue must have a value less than or equal to 45.0, or the property it:temperatureAlertEnabled must be true, with a validation failure message "If temperature exceeds 45°C, alert system must be enabled."

The SHACL shape :ReviewTextShape targets all instances of the class schema1:Review, requiring each to have exactly one schema1:reviewBody property with a value that is a string (xsd:string) of at least 20 characters in length, otherwise producing the validation message "Review text must be at least 20 characters long."

The SHACL shape :ReviewDateShape applies to all instances of the class schema1:Review, requiring each instance to have exactly one schema1:datePublished property with a value of type xsd:date; if this property is missing or has an invalid value, validation will fail with the message "Review must include the publication date."

The SHACL shape :RatingScaleShape targets all instances of the class schema1:Rating and specifies that the property schema1:bestRating must have exactly one value, which is a decimal (xsd:decimal) equal to 5.0; if the value is higher, validation will fail with the message "The highest rating value allowed is 5.0."

The SHACL shape :ReviewLanguageShape targets all instances of the class schema1:Review, mandating exactly one value for the property schema1:inLanguage, which must be a language code (xsd:language), and will trigger a validation error with the message "Review must specify the language in which it is written." if this requirement is not met.

The SHACL shape :RatingTitleShape targets all instances of the class schema1:Review, enforcing a constraint on the property schema1:name, which must be a string (xsd:string) with a minimum length of 5 characters and a maximum length of 100 characters, and will produce the validation message "Review title must be between 5 and 100 characters" if the constraint is violated.

The SHACL shape :RatingTimestampShape applies to all instances of the class schema1:Rating, requiring exactly one schema1:dateCreated property with a value of type xsd:dateTime; if this property is missing or its value is not a valid dateTime, validation will fail with the message: "A timestamp must be recorded for when the rating was created."

The SHACL shape :ReviewerNameShape targets all instances of the class foaf:Person, requiring each instance to have exactly one value for the property foaf:name that must be a string (xsd:string) with a minimum length of 3 characters; if this property is missing or its value does not meet the length requirement, validation will fail with the message: "Reviewer must have a name with at least 3 characters."

The SHACL shape :LanguageTagUniquenessShape targets all instances of the class schema1:Review, enforcing uniqueness of the schema1:reviewBody property values per language tag, with a validation error message "Review body must be unique per language tag."

The SHACL shape :PurchaseVerificationFlagShape targets all instances of the class schema1:Review, mandating the presence of a single boolean-valued schema1:verifiedPurchase property, and will trigger a validation error with the message "Review must indicate whether the purchase was verified." if this property is missing or its value is not a boolean.

The SHACL shape :UserAccountIRIShape applies to all instances of the class foaf:OnlineAccount, requiring them to have exactly one value for the property foaf:accountServiceHomepage, which must be a valid IRI, with a validation failure message "User's account must include a valid IRI to the service homepage."

The SHACL shape :InvalidLanguageNotAllowedShape targets all instances of the class schema1:Review and specifies that the property schema1:inLanguage must not have the value "xx", with a maximum cardinality of 0 occurrences of this value, otherwise the validation will fail with the message "Invalid language code 'xx' is not allowed for reviews."

The SHACL shape :HighRatingJustificationShape targets all instances of the class schema1:Review, requiring at least one schema1:reviewRating property with a schema1:ratingValue of exactly 5.0 to be present, and validation will fail with the message "Perfect 5-star reviews must be explicitly justified with a comment" if such a perfect rating lacks a corresponding justification.

The SHACL shape :MultilingualReviewShape applies to all instances of the class schema1:Review, enforcing uniqueness of schema1:reviewBody values per language tag, thus supporting multilingual content, and returns a validation error with the message "Each review body must be unique per language tag to support multilingual content" if this constraint is violated.

The SHACL shape :AnonymousReviewerRestrictionShape targets all instances of the class schema1:Review, requiring that each schema1:Review has exactly one schema1:author property, which must either have a value that is an instance of the class foaf:Person or have the value "Anonymous", otherwise the validation will fail with the message: "Reviews must either be linked to a person or marked as 'Anonymous'."

The SHACL shape :TransactionIDShape targets all instances of the class schema1:Invoice, enforcing a constraint on the required property schema1:identifier to have a single value that is a string (xsd:string) with a minimum length of 6 characters and matching the pattern "^[A-Z0-9\\-]+$", i.e., consisting only of alphanumeric characters, dashes, and uppercase letters, and producing the validation message "Each e-receipt must have a valid alphanumeric transaction ID." if this constraint is violated.

The SHACL shape :TotalAmountShape targets all instances of the class schema1:Invoice, and enforces a constraint on the property schema1:totalPaymentDue, requiring it to have exactly one value that is a float (xsd:float) at least 0.01 (inclusive); if this constraint is violated, the validation will produce the message: "The total amount due must be at least 0.01."

The SHACL shape :PaymentMethodShape targets all instances of the class schema1:PaymentMethod, requiring each instance to have exactly one schema1:name property with a string value (xsd:string), and if this constraint is not met, validation will fail with the message "Each payment method must be labeled with a name."

The SHACL shape :ReceiptIssuerShape targets all instances of the class schema1:Invoice, requiring exactly one value for the schema1:broker property, which must be an instance of schema1:Organization, indicating the issuing organization of each e-receipt; if this property is missing or does not meet this condition, validation will fail with the message: "Each e-receipt must indicate the issuing organization."

The SHACL shape :PaymentStatusShape targets all instances of the class schema1:Invoice and requires them to have exactly one schema1:paymentStatus property with a string value (xsd:string) that must be one of the allowed values: "Paid", "Pending", or "Cancelled", otherwise validation will fail with the message: "Payment status must be Paid, Pending, or Cancelled."

The SHACL shape :LineItemCountShape targets all instances of the class schema1:Invoice, specifying that each instance must have at least one value (minimum count of 1) for the property schema1:mainEntity, and will fail validation with the message "Each e-receipt must include at least one line item" if this constraint is not met.

The SHACL shape :ItemUnitPriceShape applies to all instances of the class schema1:Product, requiring the property schema1:price to have exactly one value that is a float (xsd:float) with a minimum inclusive value of 0.01, and will produce the validation message "Product price must be at least 0.01" if this constraint is violated.

The SHACL shape :ReceiptConfirmationShape applies to all instances of the class schema1:Invoice, mandating that each instance has exactly one schema1:confirmationNumber property with a value that is a string (xsd:string) of at least 5 characters in length, and if this constraint is not met, validation will fail with the message: "A confirmation number must be included in the receipt."

The SHACL shape :OrderLinkAndAmountShape targets all instances of the class schema1:Invoice, requiring them to have at least one value for the property schema1:referencesOrder and exactly one value for the property schema1:totalPaymentDue, which must be a float with a minimum value of 1.00; if these conditions are not met, validation will fail with the message: "A receipt must link to an order and specify an amount ≥ 1.00."

The SHACL shape :MultiTaxTypeShape targets all instances of the class schema1:Invoice and requires them to have at least one schema1:taxAmount property with a value of 0.01 or greater (xsd:float), otherwise validation will fail with the message "At least one tax amount must be ≥ 0.01."

The SHACL shape :ReceiptAndBrokerCheckShape applies to all instances of the class schema1:Invoice, requiring the presence of at least one schema1:confirmationNumber and exactly one schema1:broker that is an instance of schema1:Organization, with a validation failure message "Receipt must include confirmation number and broker organization."

The SHACL shape :ItemPriceRangeShape targets all instances of the class schema1:Product, requiring each to have exactly one schema1:price property with a float value (xsd:float) within the inclusive range of 0.01 and 9999.99, and producing the validation message "Item price must be between 0.01 and 9999.99" if this constraint is violated.

The SHACL shape :RuleEnabledShape targets all instances of the class it:ControlRule, requiring each instance to have exactly one boolean value for the property it:isEnabled, and will return a validation error with the message "Each control rule must specify whether it is enabled" if this property is missing or has an invalid value.

The SHACL shape :TriggerSensorShape targets all instances of the class it:Trigger, requiring each trigger to be linked to exactly one instance of the class it:Sensor via the property it:triggeredBy, with a failure message "Each trigger must be linked to a sensor."

The SHACL shape :TemperatureRangeShape targets all instances of the class it:Sensor, enforcing a constraint on the property it:temperatureValue, which must have exactly one value that is a float (xsd:float) within the range of -30.0 to 60.0 degrees Celsius (inclusive), and producing the message "Temperature must be between -30 and 60 degrees Celsius" if this constraint is violated.

The SHACL shape :MotionSensitivityShape targets all instances of the class it:Sensor, specifying a single property constraint on it:sensitivityLevel, which must have exactly one value that is an integer (xsd:integer) between 1 and 10, inclusive; if this property's value falls outside this range, validation will fail with the message: "Motion sensor sensitivity must be a value between 1 and 10."

The SHACL shape :BatteryLevelShape applies to all instances of the class it:SmartDevice, mandating that each device has exactly one value for the property it:batteryLevel, which must be an integer (xsd:integer) within the range of 0 to 100 (inclusive), otherwise, the validation will produce the message: "Battery level must be a percentage between 0 and 100."

The SHACL shape :ScheduleStartShape targets all instances of the class it:Schedule, requiring each instance to have exactly one it:startTime property with a valid date-time value (xsd:dateTime); if this constraint is not met, the validation will fail with the message "Schedule must specify a valid start time."

The SHACL shape :PowerConsumptionShape applies to all instances of the class it:SmartDevice, specifying that the property it:powerUsageWatts must have exactly one value, which must be a decimal number (xsd:decimal) greater than or equal to 0.0; if this constraint is not met, validation will fail with the message "Power usage must be a positive number in watts."

The SHACL shape :TriggerActionLinkShape targets all instances of the class it:Trigger, enforcing that each trigger must have exactly one value for the property it:executesAction, which must be an instance of the class it:ControlAction, otherwise a validation error will occur with the message: "Each trigger must execute a valid control action."

The SHACL shape :AutoLightingConditionShape applies to all instances of the class it:ControlRule, specifying that either the property it:ambientLightLevel must have a decimal value not exceeding 20.0 or the property it:motionDetected must have a boolean value set to true, with a validation failure message "Automatic lighting rule must activate if ambient light is low or motion is detected" if neither condition is met.

The SHACL shape :RoomDeviceMinimumShape targets all instances of the class it:Room, enforcing a constraint that each room must have at least one it:hasDevice property associated with an instance of the class it:SmartDevice, with a validation failure message "Each room must have at least one associated smart device" if this condition is not met.

The SHACL shape :SecureCameraStreamShape applies to all instances of the class it:CameraDevice, requiring it:streamURL to have exactly one value that matches the pattern "^https://", meaning the URL must start with "https://" for secure access, and will fail validation with the message "Camera stream URL must start with https:// for secure access." if this constraint is not met.

The SHACL shape :DeviceLabelUniquenessShape targets all instances of the class it:SmartDevice, enforcing a constraint on the property it:label to have a unique string value (xsd:string) across all language tags, with a validation error message "Device label must be unique across languages."

The SHACL shape :RatingValueShape targets all instances of the class schema1:Rating and enforces a constraint on the mandatory property schema1:ratingValue, requiring its value to be a single decimal number (xsd:decimal) within the range of 1.0 and 5.0 (inclusive), otherwise producing the validation error message "Rating must be a decimal value between 1.0 and 5.0."

The SHACL shape :ReviewerIdentityShape targets all instances of the class schema1:Review, enforcing a constraint that requires each review to have exactly one author, which must be a resource of type foaf:Person, specified through the property schema1:author; if this constraint is violated, the validation will produce the message: "Each review must be associated with a valid person as the author."

The SHACL shape :VerifiedPurchaseShape applies to all instances of the class schema1:Review, requiring exactly one value for the schema1:isBasedOn property, which must be of type schema1:Order, and ensuring that the review is properly linked to a verified purchase order, if applicable, with a validation failure message of "Review must be linked to a verified purchase order if applicable."

The SHACL shape :WorstRatingShape targets all instances of the class schema1:Rating, specifying that the property schema1:worstRating must have exactly one value, which must be the decimal 1.0; if this property does not meet this requirement, validation will fail with the message "The lowest rating value allowed is 1.0."

The SHACL shape :ItemReviewedShape applies to all instances of the class schema1:Review, requiring them to have exactly one schema1:itemReviewed property with a value that is a valid IRI, and validation will fail with the message "Review must be associated with a valid item IRI." if this constraint is not met.

The SHACL shape :ReviewerEmailShape targets all instances of the class foaf:Person, requiring each to have exactly one foaf:mbox property with a string value (xsd:string) that matches the pattern "^mailto:.+@.+\\..+$", representing a valid email address in the "mailto:" format, and will raise a validation error with the message "Reviewer must have a valid email address using 'mailto:' format" if this constraint is not met.

The SHACL shape :ReviewRatingLinkShape targets all instances of the class schema1:Review, requiring each to have exactly one schema1:reviewRating property with a value that is an instance of schema1:Rating, and will fail validation with the message "Each review must include a rating object" if this property is missing.

The SHACL shape :RatingScaleUnitShape applies to all instances of the class schema1:Rating, specifying that the property schema1:ratingExplanation must have a single string value (xsd:string) with a maximum length of 200 characters, and validation will fail with the message "Explanation of the rating must not exceed 200 characters" if this constraint is not met.

The SHACL shape :ReviewLengthLimitShape targets all instances of the class schema1:Review, enforcing a constraint on the property schema1:reviewBody to be a single string value with a maximum length of 1000 characters, and producing the message "Review body must not exceed 1000 characters" if this constraint is violated.

The SHACL shape :RatingLabelShape targets all instances of the class schema1:Rating and requires them to have exactly one schema1:ratingExplanation property with a string value (xsd:string), otherwise validation will fail with the message: "Rating must include a brief label or explanation."

The SHACL shape :RatingOrFeedbackShape applies to all instances of the class schema1:Review, specifying that each review must have either a rating of type schema1:Rating via the schema1:reviewRating property or a feedback of at least 30 characters via the schema1:reviewBody property, with a failure message "Each review must have either a rating or a sufficiently long feedback" if neither condition is met.

The SHACL shape :VerifiedUserQualifiedShape applies to all instances of the class schema1:Review, requiring that the schema1:author property has at least one value (minimum count of 1) that is an instance of foaf:OnlineAccount, which is accessible via the foaf:account path, with a validation failure message "Reviewer must have at least one associated online account."

The SHACL shape :TimestampAndOrderLinkShape applies to all instances of the class schema1:Review, mandating the presence of exactly one schema1:datePublished property with a value of type xsd:date and exactly one schema1:isBasedOn property with a value that is an instance of schema1:Order; if either property is missing or invalid, validation will fail with the message "Reviews must include both a date of publication and a related order."

The SHACL shape :TransactionDateShape targets all instances of the class schema1:Invoice, requiring each instance to have exactly one schema1:paymentDueDate property with a valid xsd:date value; validation will fail with the message "Each e-receipt must specify the transaction date" if this property is missing or has an invalid date value.

The SHACL shape :CurrencyShape applies to all instances of the class schema1:Invoice, requiring that the schema1:currency property has exactly one string value (xsd:string) that must be one of "USD", "EUR", "GBP", or "INR", with a validation error message "Currency must be one of USD, EUR, GBP, or INR." if this constraint is not met.

The SHACL shape :ReceiptEmailShape targets all instances of the class schema1:Invoice, specifying that each must have exactly one schema1:customer property with a value of type schema1:Person, and will fail validation with the message "E-receipt must reference a valid customer as schema:Person" if this constraint is not met.

The SHACL shape :InvoiceItemShape targets all instances of the class schema1:Invoice, enforcing a single mandatory occurrence of the property schema1:referencesOrder, which must link to an instance of the class schema1:Order, with the validation error message "Each e-receipt should link to an associated order."

The SHACL shape :VATAmountShape targets all instances of the class schema1:Invoice, enforcing a single-value constraint on the property schema1:taxAmount, requiring its value to be a float (xsd:float) with a minimum inclusive value of 0.0; if this constraint is violated, the validation will produce the message: "Tax amount (VAT) must be zero or higher."

The SHACL shape :ItemQuantityShape targets all instances of the class schema1:Product, requiring each to have exactly one value (no cardinality constraint is specified, but the existence of a value is implied) for the property schema1:amount, which must be an integer (xsd:integer) with a minimum inclusive value of 1, and will produce the message "Each product must have a quantity of at least 1" if this constraint is violated.
